sheet.text: We're back at the crash site...
And it looks like the Tetra's in good shape!
Wow...
They actually fixed her up!
Pipipi!
*chuckle*
Much of the thanks goes to my new friend, Risukuma, here.
He was instrumental in the repairs.
Bah, don't mention it.
It's kind of ironic, when you think about it.
We became such close friends getting your ship ready...
But that just means saying goodbye is even harder now.
That's true, but no matter where we travel among the stars...
I'll never forget the fun we had!
And I'll miss you, Ess! ★
*sigh*
Tch! I'll miss you too. I mean... probably.
You were a big help fixing the Tetra!
You mean it? ★ You'll... You'll... really miss me? ★
Hey, don't twist my words.
I MIGHT miss you, but not for another week or so! Sheesh!
Ess n' Maguro, sittin' in a tree~!
Maguro n' Ess, sittin' in a tree~!
P~U~Y~O~I~N~G~!
That's the dumbest song I've ever heard, you two!
Doesn't sound so horrible to me! ★
Captain, it is time for us to depart.
Right. Thank you, everyone.
T-Take care, Tee.
Ringo...
*sigh*
Aren't we forgetting one small detail...?
You are NOT leaving us behind!
Pi-Pipipi!
But Tetriminos are still falling...
And there's still Puyos in the Constellation Zone.
This mystery is still wide open, as far as I see it.
Oh my gosh, she's right!
I thought our mission was all over!
Sounds like it's just getting started... ★
The Dark Prince said something interesting, for once.
The culprit is someone who can travel between dimensions... I wonder...
Tee, I'd like to go with and look for him.
I have a feeling our part in this mission isn't over yet.
Is that alright?
You bet it is!
Let's get this sideshow on the road!
Huh? Y-You're coming too?
Naturally.
You expect me to sit around here all day?
Well, then it's settled!
Prepare to depart!
SS Tetra, to the stars!
There's so much space out here in... space!
Tee, the being we're looking for is named Ecolo.
Errh...?
He's out here somewhere.
"Somewhere" is a pretty large area.
Yeah, any idea where to start?
Tch! Um, guys...
I think the answer's been under our noses this whole time.
THERE HE IS!
Egads!
Th-That blob's been staring at us this whole time!
THAT'S Ecolo...?
Pipipipipipipi!
Didn't someone mention a drooling guy?
How dare you sit there and eavesdrop! ...And drool all over!
Hrmmm...?
Hey, he's getting away!
Get back here, Ecolo!
Jazz fingers!
AHHH! SPACE FISH!
Baby, ol' Suketoudara's here to turn all your wishes... to fishes!
I got the swishes, oh-so funkalicious, movin'-groovin' without stitches!
What the heck's going on!?
*screaming loud enough to be heard in the vast vacuum of space*
I hate big, ugly fish!
Well, excuse me for havin' some "sole," lady.
You need to go! Now! Shoo! SHOOOO!
If you don't go, then I'm going to battle you!
Eh!? You want a battle, miss!? YOU GOT ONE! *chika-chikah!*
*sniffle* Please go...
These guys are shellfish. I feel downright fishtreated here.
Hey, uh... dancing fish-man.
Wh-Why are you up here?
Not to play "koi," but I'm not sure actually.
I was just doin' my thing, and I felt somethin' tuggin' me. So I came!
Here's what you do when life hands you a lemon, babycakes...
YA SHAKE YOUR "HALIBUT," AND YA DANCE... DANCE... D-D-D-DANCE!
Gee, I feel like we could learn so much from you...
Hey, Ringo, don't forget our mission.
Oh, right! We need to find Ecolo.
Bye, Mr. Fish!
The heck...!? You're just gonna up n' leave, like I'm some sorta weirdo?
Don't make ol' Suketoudara swim solo!
Whale, whale, whale... Those cats really left me behind.
*sigh* Guess I'm just a big fish in an even bigger pond...
Yep, just me... and a sea o' stars...
...and that other fish-face.
OH MY "COD"!
Where'd YOU come from?
It is a pleasure to meet you! I am the Ocean Prince.
Prince Shellbrick III, at your service! Charmed, I'm sure!
You see, I was fleeing from my butler... and... well...
I wound up here somehow!
Well, slugger, you certainly got yourself in quite a pickle.
Ya got any idea where you are?
Nope!
But now you're here to take me back!
This clownfish ain't "herring" a word I'm sayin'.
Look, chum, I been flounderin' 'round these parts awhile now...
SILENCE!
All we need to do is pop some Puyos, fishbrain!
You pop enough, and it teleports you to another world!
Now, let's hustle!
Hoi! Guess I should show this honkytonk how to hustle...!
Hm... interesting... fascinating...
You line up the blocks and... --OH! That's all?
Bet I could use this as an ingredient for a new potion!
Who's the girl with the funny hat?
Oh, boysenberry....!
Guess she got warped up here too.
You there.
I need a magic assistant.
Wanna help?
Huh!? Me?
Yes, you~!
I'm doing an experiment with these blocks.
But I need someone to help me.
Are you challenging me to a battle?
Ah, I see now!
Thank you for your help. You were a good assistant.
Have a nice day! Ehehe!
Does she... even realize that she's up in space...?
It's impressive.
She's very focused, you might say.
Are you two done?
We gotta follow this trail of drool before it disappears!
Pipipipi-Pipipipi!
Rawrrr! Where am I?
Nothing about this place looks familiar!
And where'd all those weird blocks come from?
There's no water... and no food...
I bet I'm super adorable as a damsel in distress...! Teehee!
RRGH! WHY'S NO ONE HERE TO SEE ME BEING SO ADORABLE!?
I HAVE THE WORST LUCK EVER!
I HOPE SOMEONE FINDS ME BEFORE I STARVE, SO THEY CAN SEE HOW CUTE I AM!
Pipi...?
Huh...?
What's this chubby little thing?
I wonder if I can eat it...?
Pipi!
Hey, sorry, pal.
BUT IT'S SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST OUT HERE!
PIPIPIPI!
Unfair...!
The chubby thing's able to make those blocks disappear!
I don't like when looks are deceiving!
Pi-Pi-Piii!
Is he gonna... eat me?
Hey there.
We're lost.
You see a black, drooling shadowy-guy sailing by?
Oh! Yeah, keep on going, and make a right up ahead.
Then, head left when the road ends. Can't miss it!
Gee, thanks!
You deserve a reward! ...I'm broke, or I'd give you one!
Okay...?
We're almost there, gang!
Pipi!
What a bunch of weirdos.
*grumble* And now I'm all alone again... and hungry...
*sob*
Where... am I...?
How'd I get stranded out here...?
Wahhh-ahh-ahh-ahh!
Oh great...
What's all the crying about?
A girl with horns!
You can talk! Hello!
Wow, THAT'S how lonely I am?
I hallucinated a girl with horns?
Boy, I'm such a silly-nilly...!
Wh-What...!?
I am NOT a figment of your imagination!
Aw, that's cute. My hallucination is trying to argue back.
Hey! Listen up!
There's only one way to prove to you I'm real!
We caught you, Ecolo!
Blrrgh...?
Why do you keep running away!?
Clearly, you're behind this mess!
That's no fair...
Huh!?
What mess, Ringo?
You all looked like you were having fun!
And you were playing with all those colored blocks!
I just wanted to play too!
WHAT!?
We had a good game of hide-n'-seek, didn't we?
THAT'S why you were running away?
I had so much fun!
Let's have more fun together!
Ecolo...!
How DARE you!
That was fun~!
You really made my day, Ringo!
Why are you being weird!?
Look, Ecolo...
I want you to sit there and think about the trouble you caused.
What trouble...?
Eh?
I didn't merge the two dimensions, Ringo.
Y-You didn't?
Um...
Well, guess we jumped to conclusions, huh?
Well, of COURSE you did, dingbrain!
The bad man has powers similar to mine.
He's known as the Keeper of Dimensions.
The "Keeper," huh?
He lives way out at the edge of spacetime.
It's his job to make sure the worlds stay separate.
...Someone hasn't been doing his job, if you ask me.
The edge of spacetime...
That's where we'll find the Keeper of Dimensions?
I guess...?
Hey, you listening to me...?
Hey, Ringo!
It isn't so easy traveling that far.
You'll need the power of Puyo Puyo AND Tetris.
You have to use them both!
If you do it just right, you can warp there!
But... how?
Well, silly, you can't get there with your current power!
Nope! You all need to get MUCH stronger-er...er!
How do we do that?
*mocking sounds*
Wh-Why do you single ME out and be rude?
Not sure.
Th-That's not a good reason...!
Next, you're gonna say I need a reason to bury you in Puyos!
Bring it! I don't get buried that easy! You'll see!
H-Hey, I won...!
Boo! You're no fun!
Oh well, good luck!
See ya, Ringo!
Hey, I'm not done with you yet!
...It's like talking to a spoiled child!
Let's look on the bright side.
He DID give us a clue, right?
Let's see what everyone thinks.
Pipi!
So that's where we stand.
To reach the edge of spacetime, we need to get stronger.
Wow, I had no idea that even existed!
So how do we get stronger?
Um... no clue!
It's easier said than done.
I wish it weren't so vague.
Oh, my, are we in trouble...?
Huh...? OH!
*giggle* Good day, everyone.
I see some new faces, meow!
Professor Accord!
Shouldn't you be back at Primp Magic School?
Why are you out here?
Oh, I was just passing by.
Wow!
Speaking of which...
Did I hear you were trying to become stronger?
Y-Yeah, all of us are...
*giggle* Never fear!
I had a sneaky feeling this might happen.
So I built you all some training grounds!
You... built us a place to train?
Without even knowing we'd need it...?
You're the best!
...Does no one else find this oddly convenient? ...No? Just me?
I bet if we all go there and battle each other, we'll all get stronger!
Eh? That would be meowtrageous!
*giggle* Indeed! No, instead, you'll have to face your own memories.
Our... what now?
You'll be training against illusions.
Close friends, powerful rivals, and everyone in between!
If you beat them all up, it'll turn YOU more meowerful!
I'm not sure I get it...
But it sure sounds like a hoot!
C'mon, everyone, what're we waiting for!?
*giggle* Safe travels~!
I believe in meow!
